title: Lady Gaga reveals she has split from sound engineer Dan Horton after months-long romance
text:
Lady Gaga is back on the market.

The singer, 33, revealed she had split from sound engineer Dan Horton while attending her friend Sarah Nicole Tanno's bachelorette party on Friday night.

Taking a photo with the bride-to-be, Gaga wrote on her Instagram stories, 'An about to be married woman and me, a single lady.'

'Me, a single lady': Lady Gaga revealed she had split from sound engineer Dan Horton while attending her friend Sarah Nicole Tanno's bachelorette party on Friday night

Gaga and Dan have been linked since the summer, after the couple were seen passionately kissing during a lunch date in Studio City.

A diner told PEOPLE: 'They were kissing as they spoke really close up,' noting that they picked up Lemonade drinks.

'She had a table in the front near the sidewalk, so she was clearly okay with being seen. She seemed very happy when interacting with the guy she was with.'

Another said: 'She seemed confident and in a good place.'

The ex: Gaga was first linked to Dan Horton after they were spotted locking lips over the summer

Gaga even posted a snap of their romantic dinner date onto Instagram in September.

She shared a photo of their candlelit dinner, and tagged him along with a string of heart emoticons.

Gaga began dating Dan following the end of her engagement to Christian Carino in February.

Like! Gaga shared a snap of her romantic, candlelit dinner with Dan in September

Gaga and Dan have been linked since the summer, after the couple were seen passionately kissing during a lunch date in Studio City (pictured November 2018)

The way they were: The hit-maker was previously engaged to Christian Carino (pictured January 2019)

A source told US Weekly in February that Gaga was, 'devastated at first' about the split, but adding that Carino, 'infringed on her creative process' that lead to the split.

'[She] couldn’t risk jeopardizing her career in that way, over a man, and that’s not something she would stand for,' the source added.

It is not the first time Gaga has been engaged.

The popstrel said 'yes' to her long-term boyfriend Taylor Kinney in February 2015, after first meeting on the set of her 2011 music video, You And I.

The engagement was called off just one year later.
description: The singer, 33, revealed she had split from sound engineer Dan Horton while attending her friend Sarah Nicole Tanno's bachelorette party on Friday night.
